alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 11:36PM EST until February 27 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 17.7 feet by Thursday morning. It will then steady off or even fall a bit early Thursday afternoon, before rising again Thursday evening. It will rise above flood stage by early Friday afternoon and continue to rise to a crest of 22.3 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 11 AM Thursday.
